forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of snow showers. Mostly sunny, with a high near 31. Northwest wind around 12 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of snow showers before 1am. Partly cloudy. Low around 24, with temperatures rising to around 27 overnight. West northwest wind 7 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Veterans Day
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Slight Chance Light Snow
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow after 1pm. Mostly cloudy. High near 40, with temperatures falling to around 36 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 9 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%.

forecast.name: Tuesday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of snow before 10pm, then a chance of freezing rain between 10pm and 11pm, then a chance of snow between 11pm and 4am, then a slight chance of rain and snow. Cloudy, with a low around 30. Southwest wind 7 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%.
